Docs.param: An enumeration value that specifies the connection type.
The display name of the connection.
The server associated with the connection.
true to use SSL encryption for the connection; otherwise, false.
The domain name associated with the connection credentials.
The user name associated with the connection credentials.
The user password associated with the connection credentials.
The directory service naming contexts associated with the connection.
The type for the claims provider definition.
The ID of the claims provider for SharePoint Server.
The claim ID map attribute for Active Directory.
Docs.summary: Adds an Active Directory connection for the current service context.
Docs.returns: The Active Directory connection for the current service context.

remarks.para: This method adds an Active Directory connection for the current service context. See User profile property data typesConnection filter data types and operators

Docs.exception: The service context already has a connection with the same name as .
